name: Baby Safety Gate
description:
Client (F/30) was a victim of long term emotional abuse by her relatives until she managed to leave the abusive household last year. She now lives with her partner and her 2 children (one 4yo, one newborn) in a rental flat and needs help getting items which make her flat safer for  her children. She is looking for:
1. Baby safety gate

name: Stroller

name: Mattress
description: Elder is of low income background and resides in a 1 room rental flat. He is unable to work and has limited mobility at the moment due to a toe wound. Elder's mattress (single size), pillow, and bedsheets are no longer suitable for use and he would appreciate any donations of the above items. Thank you.

passiton.name: Super Single Size Mattress
passiton.description:
Super Single Size cushion type mattress.  
Giving out as we are moving out. 
Will be giving out together with the sheet shown in the photo.
As I still using it, I only can give out on 28 Mar (Thursday), 29 Mar (Friday PH), 30 Mar (Saturday). 28 Mar delivery prefered.

I am able to arrange logistic to deliver to the need (islandwide). 
I will pay for the delivery fee. 

I can be contacted via email or whatapps. Thank you

name: Sofa
description: This is a family composed of two 70+ years old elderly clients. The husband is suffering from terminal cancer and is undergoing chemotherapy. Since there is no other source of income in the household, they are currently in need of a sofa. The previously donated second-hand sofa is now damaged. They are hoping to find new donors who can contribute any form of sofa. Would appreciate if donor can cover transport costs. Please WhatsApp messages Hsin Yu at 8911 8058 or email to hsinyu_lee@viriya.org.sg to liaise.

passiton.name: Sofa chair and 3 coffee table top
passiton.description: Sofa chair is in good condition. The 3 table top comes in 3 sizes and versatile. (Small, Medium and large. )

name: Sofa bed
description: Client is a single mother with a 10-year-old son living in a rental flat. Due to low income, they cannot afford a new mattress even though the current one has started to smell. Therefore, they plead with donors to donate a double sofa bed (considering that the rental flat doesn't have separate rooms, space is limited). We would be extremely grateful if the donor can cover the delivery costs. Please contact Hsin Yu via WhatsApp messages at 8911 8058 or email: hsinyu_lee@viriya.org.sg to liaise.
